info.task: navigate backwards into a form landmark
info.title: Navigate backwards into a form landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterForm
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the form landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the form landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('afterlink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Bottom' link.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Bottom' link.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, exit Forms Mode to activate the Virtual Cursor by pressing Escape.
